name: The Ritual (CursedStudios)
description:
Your land is haunted by ghosts and you are the only one who can perform the ritual to heal the land.

Collect all the runes you need for the ritual.
Use your shotgun to fight the ghosts and reach high places.

Controls:
[A]: Move left
[D]: Move right
[space]: jump
[lmb]: shoot
[mouse]: aim

Credits:
Art: 1-bit and rune pack by Kenney(https://www.kenney.nl/)
Sounds: Brackeys Megapack(https://devassets.com/assets/2d-mega-pack/),  ghost sound by Ogrebane(https://opengameart.org/content/ghost)
Abient music: Dark Fantasy Music Pack by Griffin Silbey(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/fantasy/dark-fantasy-music-p...)
